    Job Search Preparation

    On this page

    • Creating a stellar Resume
    • Making a quality Cover Letter
    • Interviewing
    • Additional Resources
      • How to prepare for a Virtual call (Zoom) and common tips

    These resources are designated to enable individuals, from all backgrounds & demographics, to get a major step into building their resume, cover letter, or any other aspect of their portfolio.

    Note: There may be resources that would not apply to your industry. However, the quality and frameworks can be (re)utilized for your objective.

    Enjoy!
